mention.text: The flaw , which was accidentally made public by Chinese security researchers just over a week ago
a growing number of Web-based attacks over the past few days
intelligence director with Verisign 's iDefense group
attack code that exploits this flaw on thousands of Web sites so far , according to Rick Howard , intelligence director with Verisign 's iDefense group
